channel.title: Game crashes @ C1A3A
channel.description:
Hi, my game crashes in level C1A3A, when I'm entering the water flooded floor at the opened elevator chamber, shortly before the first troopers are appearing. I searched for the minidump file, but nothing like this exists on my system.....I was also not able to locate that folder you specified... :frowning:
I ran BM on a DELL Laptop with a nvidia GeForce GT650M.
I tried already to de-active all graphic performance options, but no success.

item.title: Game crashes @ C1A3A
item.dc:creator: el_espiritu
item.description:
Hi, my game crashes in level C1A3A, when I’m entering the water flooded floor at the opened elevator chamber, shortly before the first troopers are appearing. I searched for the minidump file, but nothing like this exists on my system…I was also not able to locate that folder you specified…

I ran BM on a DELL Laptop with a nvidia GeForce GT650M.

I tried already to de-active all graphic performance options, but no success.

Read full topic
